onElimination.name: On elimination
onElimination.description: Send your messages of choice when eliminated. Will not send again when winning.

durabilityWarning.name: Durability
durabilityWarning.description: Durability points left when the warning is displayed

chat.name: Chat
chat.description: Display the warning message in chat

actionbar.name: Action bar
actionbar.description: Display the warning in the action bar

notification.name: Toast notification
notification.description: Display the warning as a toast notification (for 3s)

respawnTimer.name: Respawn timer
respawnTimer.description: Adds to a countdown timer to a players name tag while respawning in EggWars.

shortFriendsList.name: Shorter friends list
shortFriendsList.description: Use /friends list full to display your full friends list

reminderToVote.name: Vote reminder
reminderToVote.description: Plays a sound and dumps a message in chat if you haven't voted when only five seconds remain!

reminderToVoteSoundId.name: Sound ID
reminderToVoteSoundId.description: The sound played to remind you to vote!

gameImage.name: Display game art instead of CubeCraft Logo

keepPlayerStats.name: Keep kills & deaths per player
keepPlayerStats.description: This might use a lot of data.

keepSnapshots.name: Keep a snapshot of your stats per day

keepPerPlayerSnapshots.name: Keep snapshots of per player data
keepPerPlayerSnapshots.description: This might use a lot of data.

minEntry.name: Player importance
minEntry.description: Minimum amount of kills/deaths needed to not be cleaned up

clearStatsTrackers.name: Clear up Game Stats Trackers
clearStatsTrackers.description:
Will remove all player data with less kills/deaths than specified.
This action is irreversible.

commandSystemSubConfig.name: Custom Commands
commandSystemSubConfig.description: Disabling the setting, disables all commands.

showDifference.name: Show Difference
showDifference.description: Shows the durability difference with the next piece to break in brackets

CCU.name: CubeCraft Utilities
CCU.description: All custom widgets provided by CubeCraft Utilities

EggWarsMapInfoCommand.mapNotFound: Could not find map with name %s

error.notTrackingAnyOneSuggestion: Currently not tracking anyone. Track someone with
error.notAnInteger: Second argument is not an integer.

helpCommand.title: ------- Friend Tracker Commands -------
helpCommand.description: Track your friends movements through CubeCraft. Checks the friends list every n seconds for updates.
helpCommand.track: - Display everyone you're currently tracking, or add new friends to be tracked
helpCommand.untrack: - Display everyone you're currently tracking, click to untrack. Or remove friends.

error.noPermissions: You need to be party owner to use this command.
error.missingArguments: You are missing required arguments, please try again.

helpCommand.title: ------- Enhanced Party Commands -------
helpCommand.reinv: - Will kick and invite the passed usernames if they are in the party.

remake.first: - Will disband the party and invite everyone

helpCommand.kick: - Will kick all the passed usernames if they are in the party.
helpCommand.invite: - Will invite all the passed usernames.
helpCommand.extra: - Displays the help message for a command. Omitting the command, displays for all commands.

gameNotFound.text: Could not find the specified game. Possible options are
gameNotFound.hover: Stats Tracking has to be enabled in the addon setting for this command to display data.

helpCommand.title: ------- Enhanced Stats Commands -------
helpCommand.displayGlobalStats: - Display your stats for a game, defaults to the game you're currently in.
helpCommand.displayPlayerStats: - Display your stats for a game, with a specific player, defaults to the game you're currently in.
helpCommand.displayGlobalStatsOnDate: - Display your stats for a game, on a specific day (ex. 2023-1-15), defaults to the game you're currently in.
helpCommand.displayPlayerStatsOnDate: - Display your stats for a game, with a specific player, on a specific day (ex. 2023-1-15), defaults to the game you're currently in.
helpCommand.requiredSetting: This has to be enabled in settings to work.
